You can come up with your own Mockup.
Create a mock webservice “login” to validate user name and password
Build a login screen which should take as input user name and password and call the “login” service to validate.
If login is successful, take the Users to display Notes Page.
Create a mock webservice to return an Array of at least 10 notes.
Users can click on any Note and should be able to edit it
Create a mock web service “saveEditedNote” which should take as input a modified note and save it in the mocked array.
Once a Note is edited call the “saveEditedNote” web service to update the note.
On the UI Users should have an option to create a new note.
Once the Users adds a Note call the “createNote” web service to persist it.
The application must contain appropriate test cases
